description: Erection of first floor partial balcony enlargement with new door access to balcony. Replacing existing balcony timber balustrade with glazed screen.
decision_conditions: By virtue of its siting, depth and design, the proposed first floor balcony would appear as a discordant feature that would be out of character with the host dwelling and the immediate surrounding area. The proposal would therefore harm the visual amenity of the area contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy (2012).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 12 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) of planning permission 20/00756/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 17/15219/FUL), (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of Planning Permission 17/14109/FUL), is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description ''Erection of single storey rear extension. Front porch and internal alteration. Hip to gable roof extension. Alteration to fenestration, thermal upgrade works.''
